text: Azam Taleghani (; 1943 - 30 October 2019) was an Iranian politician, activist and journalist. She was the head of the Society of Islamic Revolution Women of Iran.Iran: Sit-in by Azam Taleghani in front of Evin prison She was the editor of Payam Hajar Weekly, and a member of the Iranian parliament from 1980 through 1984.فرخ‌زاد، پوران (Pooran Farrokhzad). کارنمای زنان کارای ایران (از دیروز تا امروز). تهران: نشر قطره، ۱۳۸۱، ، 533. Taleghani was born in Tehran. Taleghani was hospitalized in November 2018 after falling at her home in Tehran. She died of a cerebral hemorrhage caused by the fall on 30 October 2019 at the age of 76 in Tehran. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Tehran Category:Writers from Tehran Category:Iranian journalists
title: Azam Taleghani
